page.title: 11SHOPPING HABITS AT THE ASDA
page.content: 60 Asda shoppers were asked about their shopping habits. {VISITS Weekly - 63% Fortnightly - 7% Monthly - 13% Bi-monthly - 1% Others - 7% { {DISTANCE LIVED FROM ASDA (Miles)} 1-2 miles - 65% 3-4 miles - 7% 5-6 miles - 13% 7-8 miles - 1% 9-10 miles - 7% 10+ miles - 7% { {DEPARTMENTS USED} Grocery - 100% Bakery - 50% Frozen Food - 35% Butchery - 33% Dairy - 25% Greengr'ry - 17% Wine/Spirits - 24% Toys - 7% Electrical - 20% Clothing - 10% { {MODE OF TRANSPORT TO ASDA Car - 72% Foot - 20% Bus - 2% Asda Bus - 6%
